IAVGWords Interface Reference

import "IAVGWords.idl";

List of all members.

Public Attributes

attribute string font
attribute string text
attribute string color
attribute long size

Detailed Description

Interface to word nodes.

Member Data Documentation

attribute string IAVGWords::color
 

The color of the string to be displayed. The notation used is the same as html, so 0xFF0000 is red, 0x00FF00 is green and 0x0000FF is blue.

attribute string IAVGWords::font
 

The font used. The font names are used to open .ttf files in the directory given by the environment variable AVG_FONT_PATH.

attribute long IAVGWords::size
 

The font size in points.

attribute string IAVGWords::text
 

The actual text to be displayed. All the text is displayed on one line.
